This cd is the bonus disc of the coffin box, containing
the demos of the album.

Recorded & mixed by mike gillies.
Recorded at HQ, San Rafael, CA between november 2005-january 2007

I thought I shoudn&#039;t put any infos as all metallica fans
already knew what this album was about.
Sadly it seems like our friends @ FLM didn&#039;t feel like my
decision at all.
I didn&#039;t use (Proper) as I never counted it as a real
release.
Do you liked my scan? That was my proper!!!

Please, fuck you and yourself guys. Go proper my ass!
As I told, the winner is 1 and only 1.

And aswell, this 2nd rip is dedicated to my few old date
friends.
Guys, WE were and we still are the real scene. We are a

All of you others trying to proper what is already

Fuck the p2p. Please, if you like this, go buy your copy
